description: In API reference, the parameters related deprecated network proxy APIs should be deprecated in limits and quota sets APIs.
title: api-ref:  parameters related deprecated network proxy APIs in limits and quota sets APIs

comments.content: In API reference, the parameters related deprecated network proxy APIs should be deprecated in limits and quota sets APIs.

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/416882
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=10919158045226d236206b67bb2bf5d88fa94a97

commit 10919158045226d236206b67bb2bf5d88fa94a97
Author: Takashi NATSUME <email address hidden>
Date:   Thu Jan 5 15:45:23 2017 +0900

    api-ref: Fix deprecated proxy API parameters
    
    All the network proxy APIs were deprecated in Newton.
    The related quotas have been filtered out in quotas APIs
    since I7311ad726f5ca50f5648a539b03c00e712235834.
    And they have also been filtered out in limits API
    since I00bad055847adbbe26fe2f9225a4adde18f546b8.
    
    But the API reference has not been updated yet.
    So fix it.
    
    Change-Id: Ie06585ab572cf6278a580bd3fdb1e86cbd0bcb7a
    Closes-Bug: #1654167
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content: This issue was fixed in the openstack/nova 16.0.0.0b1 development milestone.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
